name: Marisa Breaks the Bank
description:
Reimu's birthday is today, and Marisa doesn't have a present yet!

Can you get Reimu something nice by ransacking a bank vault for 5 minutes??
Run and jump around the rooms of the vault, break open boxes, and collect loot!

For Touhou Game Jam 6's theme of combo, the intent was to have the player collect loot in quick succession to pump up the earnings to sky-high levels! ... but the programmer forgot to build this system. 

So instead, the honorary combo theming goes to Marisa (pictured) and Yukari (pictured but less often), who are working together to help Marisa get Reimu something nice for her special day. She deserves it!

CREDITS
PROGRAM: invelica
ART: nora
PIXEL: bitmap
Free audio from まんぼう二等兵 and LittleRobotSoundFactory.

This HTML5 game is made with Godot, and should be played in a 1280x720 window or larger.
A 72-hour submission for Touhou Game Jam 6.
